caseTitle: Rao Abdul Rehman v. Muhammad Afzal, etc
tagline: Discussion on Section 42 & 22 of the Specific Relief Act, Section 54 of the Transfer of Property Act, Article 113 of Limitation Act, 1908 & Section 10 of the Contract Act. The phrase consensus ad idem connotes a meeting of the minds to describe the intention of parties. Effect of doctrine of caveat emptor in the case.
